attributes.action: Stop the bombing of Syria and all military involvement in the Middle East.
attributes.additional_details: European countries are now paying the price for turning a blind eye to the actions of Europe and the U.S in the Middle East.
attributes.background: British involvement in the Middle East to implement security contracts, Oil deals, Central Banks and various other corruption is causing vast numbers of innocent people to be displaced, killed, raped and starve. The bombing of Syria and military involvement only destabilises the region.
